tickets.name: Marcus Aurelius
tickets.subject: System Crash on Login
tickets.content: Hello support, I am unable to log into the main dashboard. Every time I enter my credentials, I get a 500 Internal Server Error. This is critical as my team cannot access our files. Please help immediately.
tickets.aiSummary: User is experiencing a critical 500 Internal Server Error upon login, preventing team access to files.
tickets.aiDraft:
Dear Marcus,

I apologize for the disruption. A 500 error usually indicates a server-side issue. I have escalated this to our engineering team immediately. Could you please confirm which browser you are using and if clearing your cache makes any difference while we investigate?

Best regards,
Support Team

tickets.name: Sarah Connor
tickets.subject: Charged twice for subscription
tickets.content: Hi there, I was checking my bank statement and noticed two charges for the monthly pro plan on Oct 25th. I only have one account. Can you please refund the duplicate charge?
tickets.aiSummary: Customer reports a duplicate charge for the monthly Pro plan on Oct 25th and requests a refund.
tickets.aiDraft:
Hello Sarah,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry for the confusion regarding the double charge. I can see the two transactions in our system. I have initiated a refund for the duplicate amount, which should appear on your statement within 3-5 business days.

Best regards,
Billing Support

tickets.name: Jean-Luc Picard
tickets.subject: Dark Mode availability?
tickets.content: Good morning. Our team really enjoys using the platform, but the white background is quite bright during night shifts. Do you have a Dark Mode feature planned for the roadmap?
tickets.aiSummary: User is inquiring about the availability or roadmap status of a 'Dark Mode' feature to reduce eye strain.
tickets.aiDraft:
Hello Jean-Luc,

We appreciate the feedback! While we don't have Dark Mode available right now, it is actually one of our most requested features and is currently on our roadmap for Q1 next year. I will tag your ticket so you get notified when it releases.

Best regards,
Product Team

tickets.name: Tony Stark
tickets.subject: Enterprise Licensing Question
tickets.content: We are looking to scale up from 50 seats to 500 seats next month. Do you offer volume discounts for enterprise tiers? Also, we need SSO integration.
tickets.aiSummary: Lead is inquiring about volume discounts for scaling to 500 seats and requires SSO integration.
tickets.aiDraft:
Hi Tony,

Thanks for considering us for your scaling needs. Yes, we absolutely offer volume pricing for 500+ seats, and our Enterprise tier includes SSO (Okta, Google, etc.) by default. I have looped in our Sales Director to provide you with a custom quote.

Best regards,
Sales Team
